main.bio: I am Anurag Sharan, a full stack web developer from India. Currently, I am studying Coumputer Science in REVA University, Bangalore.

testimonials.text: Anurag is an excellent programmer who can pick up new concepts easily. His drive to work and complete projects is something that I haven't seen in anyone else.
